file  pizMarkovModel.h

Defines

#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_START   0
#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_TRANSITIONS   1
#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_EMISSIONS   2
#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_DATA   3

Functions

void pizMarkovModelSetPersistence (PIZMarkovModel *x, double f)
PIZError pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray (const PIZMarkovModel *x, long n, PIZGrowingArray *a)

Define Documentation

#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_START   0

Index of node's start probability in pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray().

#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_TRANSITIONS   1

Index of node's number of transitions in pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray().

#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_EMISSIONS   2

Index of node's number of emmissions in pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray().

#define PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_DATA   3

Index of data in pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray.

Function Documentation

void pizMarkovModelSetPersistence ( PIZMarkovModel *  x,
double  f 
)

Set the persistence ratio of learning.

Remarks:
HMM = ((old * persistence) + new) / (persistence + 1.)
Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
n The new persistence.

PIZError pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray ( const PIZMarkovModel *  x,
long  n,
PIZGrowingArray *  a 
)

Encode node's probabilities to a dynamic array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
n The index of the node.
a A pointer to a dynamic array.
Returns:
An error code.
Remarks:
The values obtained (percents) are approximations. An example : 
  long            err = PIZ_GOOD;
  long            n = 4;
  PIZGrowingArray *a = pizGrowingArrayNew (256);

  err = pizMarkovModelEncodeToArray (hmm, n, a);

  if (!err)
      {
          long i;
          long start_probability, transition_probability, emission_probability;
          long t = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_TRANSITIONS);
          long e = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_EMISSIONS);
          long *ptr = pizGrowingArrayPtr (a);

          start_probability = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_START);

          for (i = 0; i < t; i++) {
                  transition_probability = ptr + PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_DATA + i;
              }
          
          for (i = t; i < (t + e); i++) {
                  emission_probability = ptr + PIZ_MARKOV_MODEL_DATA + i;
              }          

      }

  pizGrowingArrayFree (a);
